visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent the monthly average temperature for a year, with the series name 'Temperature'. Additionally, the chart should have custom colors and additional configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature' that is floating and aligned to the left. The x-axis represents the months of the year with styled labels, and the y-axis represents the temperature in degrees Celsius with a styled title and labels. The data series named 'Temperature' contains the monthly average temperatures for a year, with a custom color applied. The chart has a light gray background and specific margins for better spacing. The legend is enabled and positioned at the top-right corner of the chart with styled text.
